question: You are creating a new JSP page and you need to execute some code that acts when the page is first executed, but only once. Which three are possible mechanisms for performing this initialization code? (Choose three)

options.C: In the constructor of the JSP’s Java code.
options.E: In a JSP declaration, which includes a static initializer block.
options.D: In a JSP declaration, which includes an initializer block.
